Package ji.common.functions

Class Env

  • java.lang.Object
    • ji.common.functions.Env
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dictionary<java.lang.String>
    public class Env
extends java.lang.Object
implements Dictionary<java.lang.String>
    Application configuration. Can be loaded from file using PropertiesLoader. Works like MapDictionary, so you can get variables with type. 
     Env env = new Env("conf/app.properties");
 // or alternativelly
 Properties prop = ...;
 Env env2 = new Env(prop);

      • getModule

        public Env getModule​(java.lang.String key)
        Returns new instance of Env. In new Env are accessible only parameters starts with given key. 
         Env env = ...;
 String value = env.getProperty("key.subkey"); // works
 
 Env sub = env.getModule("key");
 String value2 = sub.getProperty("subkey"); // works
 String value3 = sub.getProperty("key.subkey"); // returns null
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        Env
